name: Action Rush
description:
A contest game based on running and jumping, consisting of simple mappings. Our goal is to reach the exit area from the top of the obstacles in 6 different maps.
We need some things to overcome the difficulties in this game that has a lot of obstacles to look for. You need to find out the qualities you need, there is no help for it.

"The important thing is not to be seen hard but to see what is easy."

NOTE: Please install this from game directory: Engine/Extras/Redist/en-us/UE4PrereqSetup_x86.exe
